sentences.english: “My cousin was a good kid, ” she said.
My cousin Ken always talks to others in class.
sentences.chinese: 我的表弟肯總是在課上與別人說話。

sentences.english: But I do,' said her cousin, shuddering.
sentences.chinese: “可是我在乎，”她的表弟說，顫慄着。

sentences.english: I also felt sorry for the other little fella!
sentences.chinese: 我還是爲那個小表弟感到無奈。

sentences.english: I’ve also got a cousin in Manchester, England.
sentences.chinese: 我在英國的曼徹斯特還有一個表弟。

sentences.english: I have a lovely cousin. His name is Bai Yun. He is seven years old.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個可愛的表弟，他叫白雲，七歲了。

sentences.english: My cousin's name is Joseph, but we call him Joe for short.
sentences.chinese: 我表弟的名字是喬瑟夫，但是我們都簡稱他爲喬。

sentences.english: Edmund and Lucy return to Narnia with their spoilt cousin Eustace Scrubb.
sentences.chinese: 艾文和魯思與他們被寵壞了的表弟尤斯特回到納尼亞。

sentences.english: She had resolved to make a pet of her little c in.
sentences.chinese: 她已經決定把她的小表弟當作一個寵兒。

sentences.english: My youngest cousin is " Dennis the Menace ", he's always full of energy.
sentences.chinese: 我的小表弟是個過動兒，他總是充滿精力。

sentences.english: He gave me some cock-and-bull story about having to be at his cousin's engagement party.
sentences.chinese: 他對我瞎說他一定得去參加他表弟的訂婚宴會。

sentences.english: My cousin cut his finger last month.
sentences.chinese: 我表弟上個月把手指劃破了。

sentences.english: However, stepped in, but also the leadership of reuse, cousin, or went.
sentences.chinese: 不過臨危受命，也是領導重用，表弟還是去了。

sentences.english: Call me cousin, own up to the street to buy a small cat.
sentences.chinese: 便叫我看好表弟，自己到街上去買小花貓。

sentences.english: Cousin, grandpa, grandmother and aunt etc is everyone here.
sentences.chinese: 表弟，外公，外婆和阿姨等人都到齊了。
